name: THE DJ PROJECT
description: The DJ Project Program is a vibrant fusion of music, media, and leadership training designed to ignite creativity and develop essential skills. Participants immerse themselves in DJing—from scratching and beat-making to live performance and mastering equipment. In Audio Production, they explore the intricacies of digital audio workstations, Pro Tools, music theory, and engineering. The Digital/New Media component equips them with expertise in media literacy, graphic design, social media manageme
